title: Topic 001 Question 173
body: You have a development workspace in the Power BI service.
You plan to use Tabular Editor to develop and deploy a new dataset, and then use Power BI Desktop to create and publish a report to the Power BI service.
Which three components should you include in the solution? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: the Read Write XMLA endpoint in a capacity
the Read Write XMLA endpoint in the tenant
a .pbix file that has an imported dataset
a .pbix file that has a live connection
